oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-04-07 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from April 7, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Jim Reeves (host/performer), guest performer Justin Tubb, and regular performers the Old Hickory Singers, Red Hayes, Tommy Jackson, Moon Mullican, Minnie Pearl, and Grandpa Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jim Reeves; Old Hickory Singers; Justin Tubb; Red Hayes; Tommy Jackson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Jim Reeves -- If You Were Mine (Jim Reeves) Opening statement (Grant Turner, Jim Reeves) -- Jim Reeves introduces the Old Hickory Singers -- Do The Nashville Polka (Old Hickory Singers) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Jim Reeves) -- Jim Reeves introduces Justin Tubb -- You Nearly Lose Your Mind (Justin Tubb) -- Jim Reeves introduces Red Hayes and Tommy Jackson -- [Unidentified fiddle tune] (Red Hayes fiddle, Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Jim Reeves talks -- I'll Fly Away (Jim Reeves) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Jim Reeves) -- Prince Albert jingle (Jim Reeves)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Hay, George D. (George Dewey), 1895-1968; Minnie Pearl; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Mullican, Moon, 1909-1967; Jackson, Tommy; Old Hickory Singers; Hayes, Red; Reeves, Jim; Tubb, Justin
